meanings.sent1: The lummy weather made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: The garden was a lummy place to relax.
meanings.sent3: The lummy picnic was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her lummy smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The lummy scent of fresh flowers filled the air.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or pleasure
meanings.sent1: Lummy! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent3: Lummy, that magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent4: Her performance was met with a loud 'lummy' from the audience.
meanings.sent5: Lummy, the fireworks lit up the night sky beautifully!
